info.name: Enhanced Medium.com Developer Theme
info.description: Dark theme for Medium.com. I am currently using it to enhance my reading. This is based on the original CSS from VioletVulpine.
info.additionalInfo: List of websites I am using it with: domain("medium.com"), domain("towardsdatascience.com"), domain("blog.usejournal.com"), domain("blog.insightdatascience.com")
